item.name: :after
item.resume: Create a pseudo-element whom is the last child of the matched element

item.name: background
item.note: Shortcut for: background-color — background-image — background-position — background-repeat and background-attachment
item.resume: Sets all background properties

item.name: background-attachment
item.resume: Specify if a background-image scrolls this the current element or is fixed within the wiewport

item.name: background-color
item.resume: Sets the background color of the current element

item.name: background-image
item.resume: Sets the background image of the current element

item.name: background-position
item.resume: Sets the background position in the current element

item.name: background-repeat
item.resume: Specify if a background-image is repeated and how

item.name: :before
item.resume: Create a pseudo-element whom is the first child of the matched element

item.name: border
item.note: Shortcut for: border-bottom — border-left — border-right and border-top
item.resume: Sets the border to each side of the box

item.name: border-bottom
item.note: Shortcut for: border-bottom-color — border-bottom-style and border-bottom-width
item.resume: Sets the bottom border of an element

item.search: css border-bottom-left-radius border bottom left radius
item.name: border-bottom-left-radius
item.resume: Sets the radius to the bottom left corner of an element

item.search: css border-bottom-right-radius border bottom right radius
item.name: border-bottom-right-radius
item.resume: Sets the radius to bottom right corner of an element

item.name: border-left
item.note: Shortcut for: border-left-color — border-left-style and border-left-width
item.resume: Sets the left border of an element

item.name: border-radius
item.note: Shortcut for: border-bottom-left-radius — border-bottom-right-radius — border-top-left-radius and border-top-right-radius
item.resume: Sets the radius to each corner of an element

item.name: border-right
item.note: Shortcut for: border-right-color — border-right-style and border-right-width
item.resume: Sets the right border of an element

item.name: border-top
item.note: Shortcut for: border-top-color — border-top-style and border-top-width
item.resume: Sets the top border of an element

item.search: css border-top-left-radius border top left radius
item.name: border-top-left-radius
item.resume: Sets the radius to the top left corner of an element

item.search: css border-top-right-radius border top right radius
item.name: border-top-right-radius
item.resume: Sets the radius to the top right corner of an element

item.name: box-sizing
item.resume: Modify default CSS behavior to calculate width and height

item.name: color
item.resume: Sets the text color in an element and child elements

item.name: display
item.resume: Modify the type of rendering of the element

item.name: :focus
item.resume: Select element when focused

item.name: font
item.note: Shortcut for: font-family — font-size — font-weight — font-style — font-variant and line-height
item.resume: Sets all font properties

item.name: font-family
item.resume: Sets the text font and specify callback fonts

item.name: font-size
item.resume: Sets the font height

item.search: css -webkit-font-smoothing webkit-font-smoothing webkit font-smoothing webkit font smoothing
item.name: -webkit-font-smoothing
item.resume: Controls the anti-aliasing when fonts are rendered

item.name: font-style
item.resume: Display the italic version of the current font

item.name: font-variant
item.resume: Display all lowercase letters as small capital letters

item.name: font-weight
item.resume: Specify the boldness of the current font

item.name: height
item.resume: Sets the height of an element

item.name: line-height
item.resume: Specify the height for a text line

item.name: margin
item.resume: Sets the margin to each side of an element

item.name: :not(selector)
item.resume: Select element if it not matches the selector in the :not() function

item.name: outline
item.note: Shortcut for: outline-color — outline-width and outline-style
item.resume: Sets the outline render of an element

item.name: outline-color
item.resume: Sets the outline color of an element

item.name: outline-style
item.resume: Sets the outline style of an element

item.name: outline-width
item.resume: Sets the outline width of an element

item.name: overflow
item.resume: Modify default CSS behavior when a text overflow a block element

item.name: overflow-x
item.resume: Modify default CSS horizontal behavior when a text overflow a block element

item.name: overflow-y
item.resume: Modify default CSS vertical behavior when a text overflow a block element

item.name: padding
item.note: Shortcut for: padding-bottom — padding-left — padding-right and padding-top
item.resume: Sets the padding to each side of an element

item.name: :required
item.resume: Select required inputs

item.name: text-align
item.resume: Sets the alignment of the text of an element

item.name: text-decoration
item.resume: Sets the text formatting underline, overline and line-through

item.name: transition
item.note: Shortcut for: transition-property — transition-duration — transition-delay and transition-timing-function
item.resume: Specify a transition when an element style property changes

item.name: transition-delay
item.resume: Sets a delay before a transition is played

item.name: transition-duration
item.resume: Sets how long a transition need to be played

item.name: transition-property
item.resume: Specify what properties shall be affect by the transition

item.name: :valid
item.resume: True if input is not empty and matches with the type attribute

item.name: width
item.resume: Sets the width of an element

item.name: array()
item.resume: Create a new array

item.name: listen()
item.resume: Server listen on given port attribute
